Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-5-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS POINT ENABLED EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response with one token

Test.Name: No AccessPoints

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-5-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS POINT ENABLED EVENT
Test.Name: Notifications for AccessPoint with no DisableAccessPoint capabilities

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-5-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS POINT ENABLED EVENT
Test.Name: Required notification is received at second attempt
Test.Description: Set Operation delay to 30 s DUT sends PM without event then DUT sends PM with required event

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-5-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS POINT ENABLED EVENT
Test.Name: No events in PM response
Test.Description: Set Operation delay to 30 s DUT sends all PM without event check that Operation delay will be used for chatching of events

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-5-1-1 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS POINT ENABLED EVENT
Test.Name: No response to Renew
Test.Description: DUT sends no response to Renew request

Test.Name: Fault to Renew (Sender)
Test.Description: DUT sends fault to Renew request
